title: Zombie Game Audio Complete
description: Your one stop shop for Zombie Game Audio
longDescription:
SFX Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f4xIFAW8Bpw&feature=youtu.be


Music Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ly6BS5261QI&feature=youtu.be


Introducing the Zombie Game Complete Audio Pack! Your one stop shop for all of your zombie game's audio needs. The pack includes 100 sound effects and 5 music tracks that will take your game to the next level. From raging zombies to powerful weapons you will bring a full immersive experience to your players. Instead of piecing several packs together and spending extra money... Get it all in one spot!


Categories for the Pack Are as follows


Zombie Sounds: Zombie roars, Attacks, and deaths


Gun Sounds: Pistol, Shotgun, and Assault Rifle. Reload sounds and weapon switch sounds included


Environment Ambience Sounds: Ambience Sounds(Indoor and Outdoor), Horror SFX, and an evil ambience


Player Character Sounds: Male and Female Player sounds consisting of jumps, injuries, and death.


Music/Misc/UI Sounds: A full feature music set list consisting of Menu music, battle music, emotional music, victory music, and defeat music. UI sounds and other Miscellaneous zombie game sounds such as car alarms and doors being broken down.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  A one stop shop for your Zombie Game Audio Needs. Everything from the footsteps, guns, zombies, music, and more included!
  •  100 SFX
  •  5 Music tracks

Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 HZ

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 11:07

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Love what you hear? Revivalstudiobooking@gmail.com for custom work
